trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around December 25th 2008
Summary: Round sphere north of the sun reflecting rainbow light.
divs: Sighting Detailswas driving south on 465 by the airport something felt like look over here and when I looked to the west and seen a round sphere reflecting rainbow light but just within the cirle of the sphere and there was light cloud movement to the east and the sphere didnt move or change postion to the north of the sun i took pictures and we kept watching it until we turned on a road to the west and the sphere could still be seen from that angle as well and we went in the house and u still could viewthe object not sure how much longe it was visible it has ben on my mind ever since then the pics i took u can diffently see the sphere in to the sun and we were even drvng 60mph and u can see the light trailers for the sphere as with the sun in the picture it was something there that wasnt moving and it looked like to me a sheild of some sort reflecting the sun rays will get pictures on here soon
